com.ece.superkids.users

Class FileUserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.users.FileUserDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDatabase

    public class FileUserDatabase
extends Object
implements UserDatabase
    The FileUserDatabase class implements for the UserDatabase class. It implements the functions to add, delete, update and get users by serializing/deserializing files from the database.
    Author:
    Marc Adam

      Create a FileUserDatabase object and set the path to .superkidsdata
